name: UCSGMeshesToolProperties
doc: Standard properties of the CSG operation

bTryFixHoles: Try to fill holes created by the Boolean operation, e.g. due to numerical errors
bTryCollapseEdges: Try to collapse extra edges created by the Boolean operation
WindingThreshold: Threshold to determine whether a triangle in one mesh is inside or outside of the other
bShowNewBoundaries: Show boundary edges created by the Boolean operation, which might happen due to numerical errors
bShowSubtractedMesh: Show a translucent version of the subtracted mesh, to help visualize geometry that is being removed
SubtractedMeshOpacity: Opacity of the translucent subtracted mesh
SubtractedMeshColor: Color of the translucent subtracted mesh
bUseFirstMeshMaterials: If true, only the first mesh will keep its material assignments, and all other faces will have the first material assigned
